action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: There are four distinct shapes of different colors: purple, green, orange, and pink. The purple shape is a cross with two vertical sections, one green and oneExtra. The green shape consists of multiple stacked and staggered horizontal rectangles. The orange shapes include a single L-shaped piece and a series of connected horizontal rectangles forming a staircase. The pink shape has a T-like form with one horizontal and one slightly rotated vertical section.
continue

The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: There are four shapes composed of smaller squares. The top-left shape is a green vertical bar with a purple horizontal bar in front of it, creating a cross ("+"). The bottom-left shape is an orange L shape positioned vertically. The top-right shape is a complicated, multi-step green and orange structure. The bottom-right shape is a light pink T shape.
